title: New Releases for April 12, 2016
description:
This week, Liberty and Rebecca discuss The Regional Office is Under Attack!, A Murder in Time, and Vexation Lullaby, and more new releases.
This episode was sponsored by the Book of the Month Club, Penguin Random House Audio, and Send Me Swooning.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
A Murder in Time by Julie McElwain
The Regional Office is Under Attack! by Manuel Gonzales
The Bed Moved: Stories by Rebecca Schiff
I Know What I’m Doing — and Other Lies I Tell Myself: Dispatches from a Life Under Construction by Jen Kirkman
Vexation Lullaby by Justin Tussing
A Fierce and Subtle Poison by Samantha Mabry
Pretty Jane and the Viper of Kidbrooke Lane: A True Story of Victorian Law and Disorder by Paul Thomas Murphy
We Believe You: Survivors of Campus Sexual Assault Speak Out by Annie E. Clark and Andrea L. Pino

What we’re reading:
The Pilo Family Circus by Will Elliott
The Bad-Ass Librarians of Timbuktu: And Their Race to Save the World’s Most Precious Manuscripts by Joshua Hammer
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
